WorkItem.Description:
When I mouse over my hit % when I look at the stats for my shadow priest.
 
It says I have 9.56%
 
6.56% from 172 hit rating
3% for 3 points in Misery
3% for 3 points in Shadow Focus
 
So it should be displaying as 12.56% hit

Comments.Message:
Since Shadow Focus only affects shadow spells (one school), it is not added into the general 'spell hit' number. I was confused about this too, and made a separate comment about it for mages.

I think an appropriate fix for this common confusion would be to display any school-specific spell hit percentages in the * tooltip text.

What version are you using? When I mouseover any 2.1.x version of Rawr, it specifically tells you what chance you have to hit with Shadow Spells. XX.XX% chance to hit with Shadow Spells. XX rating above/below cap.
